CustomField.description: This field will be marked true during reversal of a payment before rate/index change.This field indicates that backdated reschedule will be required for the related contract.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will be marked true during reversal of a payment before rate/index change.This field indicates that backdated reschedule will be required for the related contract.
CustomField.label: Backdated Reschedule Required
